text: Neptunium(III) fluoride or neptunium trifluoride is a chemical compound of neptunium and fluorine with the formula NpF3. ==Synthesis== Neptunium(III) fluoride can be prepared by reacting neptunium dioxide with a gas mixture of hydrogen and hydrogen fluoride at 500 °C: :\mathrm{2\ NpO_2\ +\ H_2\ +\ 6\ HF\ \longrightarrow \ 2\ NpF_3\ +\ 4\ H_2O} ==References== Category:Neptunium compounds Category:Fluorides
title: Neptunium(III) fluoride
